alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 1:53PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Alachua, northeastern Marion and southwestern Putnam Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 152 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout and gusty winds over Citra to Lochloosa, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort McCoy, Citra, Lake Delancy, Sparr, Orange Springs, Hog Valley and Lochloosa. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Putnam
